text: Hello! Wondering if anyone can help me with something. Long story short, I am creating a page that is an endpoint, it will display a number of hubl tokens with data. I thought maybe the simplest solution would to put a query parameter in the url (like email, but apparently that can be a security issue?).  Does anyone have a better solution?
I’m not sure what you are asking about… can you provide some more context?

that is a beautiful way of doing that!

Were you able to figure out hte pagination yet?

it might be easier to store your hubl variables inside a data attribute

so `<div data-price="{{ data.prodcut_1_price }}">`

Also, if you are inside a for loop
```{% for date in dates %}
 {{ date.product_date }}
{% endfor %} ```
making sure are using the iterator
